comment: How many are tired of the mindless shit being thrown out about Boomers? Raise your hand. Hahaha these kids are cute though, aren't they, even if they do need a good trip to the wood shed.

                  :ARG1-of (s / shit-01)
                  :mod (m2 / mindless)
                  :ARG1-of (t3 / throw-out-06

                              :mod (b / boomer))))
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :quant (a / amr-unknown)))
      :snt2 (r / raise-01

            :ARG0 (y / you
                  :part (h / hand))
            :ARG1 h)
      :snt3 (c / cute

                  :mod (t4 / this))
            :mod (h2 / haha
                  :mode expressive)
            :concession (e / even-if
                  :op1 (n / need-01

                        :ARG1 (t5 / trip-03
                              :ARG0 k
                              :ARG1 (s2 / shed
                                    :consist-of (w / wood))
                              :ARG1-of (g / good-02))))))

comment: I think we all need to take a step back and realize that we all live and breath. There's no reason to be point fingers.

                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (s / step-01
                              :ARG1 w
                              :direction (b / back))
                        :op2 (r / realize-01

                                    :op1 (l / live-01

                                    :op2 (b2 / breathe-01

      :snt2 (r2 / reason
            :polarity -
